document_data.name: Serdel
document_data.mainbody:
'''Serdel''' was a soldier of [[Dawnfire]] during the [[Dawn Age]] around the year {{Yearlink|-25000}}.
{{quote|Hail,  dragon slayer.|Serdel to Rhespen after the forces slew a green dragon{{cite book/Realms of the Elves/Traitors|32}}}}
document_data.Activities: Serdel was a soldier of Dawnfire, serving under King [[Orchtrien]] as a second-in-command under [[Rhespen Ash]].
document_data.History: Serdel served under Rhespen Ash during a winter incursion in {{Yearlink|-25090}}, in which the elven commander was sent to raid territories of neighboring [[green dragon]]s by the [[gold dragon]] king Orchtrien. One night in the incursion, Serdel was among the troops with Rhespen when a green dragon attacked the elf's forces. Rhespen's magic and planning allowed them to kill the dragon; Serdel congratulated his commander as a dragonslayer after the fact.{{cite book/Realms of the Elves/Traitors|32}}
